name: dam.io
body:
Some stuff I made:

* [Django News](http://dj.dam.io)
* [MT10](http//dam.io/mt10/) : some fondamental mathematics in javascript
* [summer job resume](http://dam.io/summerjob/) : a mystery to r/solve
* [el canary](http://canary.dam.io)
* [NotesManager](https://github.com/MDamien/NotesManager) : A school project I've been a badass at

Also, I made somes Android apps:
* [Bus Compiegne](https://github.com/MDamien/CompiBus)
* [Hangman](https://github.com/MDamien/android-guesstheword)
* [GifMyLife](https://github.com/MDamien/GifMyLife)

I also created this awesome club [FabLab UTC](http://assos.utc.fr/fablab)

I host most of my projects on [WebFaction](https://www.webfaction.com/), the greatest hosting solution I ever tried!

***

![chat](http://i.imgur.com/EXqTLNe.jpg)

![char](http://i.imgur.com/mUUBD4S.jpg)

![chas](http://25.media.tumblr.com/e3ad2726f147e6d74c3b9632e0ab95b1/tumblr_mngl49wIBT1qal819o1_1280.jpg)

Vous aussi vous aimez les chats ? Voici mon [CV](https://github.com/MDamien/cv/raw/master/cv.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
